concept.title: Temperature and Pressure Relief Valve Discharge Pipe Requirements

li.p: Shall not be smaller in size than the outlet-pipe size of the valve, or have any reducing couplings or other restrictions.

ul.li: Shall not be plugged or blocked.
Shall not be exposed to freezing temperatures.
Shall be of material listed for hot-water distribution.
Shall be installed so as to allow complete drainage of both the Temperature-Pressure Relief Valve and the discharge pipe.
Must terminate a maximum of above a floor drain or external to the building. In cold climates, it is recommended that the discharge pipe be terminated at an adequate drain inside the building.
Shall not have any valve or other obstruction between the relief valve and the drain.
